description.fr:
{#CRITICAL}\_: Piochez {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Spell.78.d2}\_{%FIRE}. 
\---
Déclenche {explosion:Spell.78.ex} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> de la cible.
description.en:
{#CRITICAL}: Draw {value:Spell.78.d2}\_{%FIRE} {%SPELLCOUNT,value:Spell.78.d2}.
\---
Triggers {explosion:Spell.78.ex} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> the target.
description.es:
{#CRITICAL}: Sacas {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Spell.78.d2}\_{%FIRE}.
\---
Activa {explosion:Spell.78.ex} alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> del objetivo.
description.de:
{#CRITICAL}: Zieht {value:Spell.78.d2}\_{%FIRE}-{%SPELLCOUNT,value:Spell.78.d2}. 
\---
Löst {explosion:Spell.78.ex} ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> das Ziel aus.
description.pt:
{#CRITICAL}: Aciona {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Spell.78.d2}\_{%FIRE}. 
\---
Aciona {explosion:Spell.78.ex} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"/> do alvo.
